title: View of the Lake and the Rocher Delille at Mortefontaine
medium: etching, watercolor, gouache and graphite on paper
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Seiferheld-Selz Fine Arts Inc., New York, NY [1]. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1976.

Notes:
[1]. The Gallery label is affixed on the mat. Several other works in the Fishkoff collection have also passed through the Seiferheld gallery in NYC, which was active throughout the 1960s under various names.
[2]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.
